Articles.Content:
Hello. Sorry in advance for my English.

I is Linux Mint 17.1 x64. Driver Nvidia-349.

In a very small KSP 20-30 fps, when moving the camera observed friezes. Although Windows 8.1 I had around 80 FPS ...

I run as:

#!/bin/bash

LC\_ALL=C ./KSP.x86\_64

My system: GTX-670 2gb, i5-2500k 4.6@, 8gb RAM.

Please help to fix the problem ...![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

[The Linux Thread.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92231-The-Linux-Thread?p=1380984#post1380984) Is your best friend. It's helped me pretty much all the way with it.

Now I'm a complete noob when it comes to the OS ( Ubuntu in my case ) so forgive me, but from what that thread had tought me is that your issue is your [mouse's polling rate.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101374-number-of-issues-running-KSP-on-Linux-Ubuntu/page2?p=1898556#post1898556) 

How to do that on your installation is another matter upon which is beyond me.

On another note. Other then the distribution you have a similar pc. Do you by chance experience a lot of lag when mach effects occur?
